nodes.text: Plateau City was a cosmopolitan city and the primary spaceport for the planet Kaller.

Plateau City and its spaceport were built by corporations reliant on the heavy volume of freighters visiting the planet during the height of the Galactic Republic. Out of Plateau City, corporations sent rare minerals and kallnut tree hardwood, the staple exports which drove the economy of Kaller.
When Order 66 broke out near the end of the Clone Wars, Jedi Padawan Caleb Dume spent days in Plateau City. Fourteen years later, he would return again to the city and look for Janus Kasmir.
